name: Connected Device Interface
short_description:
An implementation of part of the Connected Device Interface (CDI) Generic Enabler as defined by the I2ND/CDI chapter within the EC FP7 Project "FI-WARE". See here for more details:
http://forge.fi-ware.eu/plugins/mediawiki/wiki/fiware/index.php/FI-WARE_Interface_to_Networks_and_Devices_(I2ND)#Connected_Devices_Interfacing_.28CDI.29
